name: smaug-marketplace-smart-contracts
description: Collection of smart contracts for the SMAUG marketplace.
author: Antonio Antonino <antonio.antonino@ericsson.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:truffle && npm run build:contracts && npm run build:ts
scripts.test:development: npm run build:truffle && npm run build:ts; npm run test:truffle
scripts.test:marketplace: npm run build:truffle && npm run build:ts; npm run test:truffle -- --network marketplace
scripts.migrate:development: npm run build; npx truffle migrate
scripts.migrate:marketplace: npm run build; npx truffle migrate --network marketplace
